channel.description:

[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/kdmmav.jpg[/img]
[center][size=14pt]TheRS-Project[/size][/center] [center][url=http://www.thersproject.smfnew.com/index.php?page=Webclient]Webclient[/url][/center] [center][url=http://www.thersproject.smfnew.com]Website[/url][/center] [center][url=http://www.therscommunity.smfnew.com/index.php?page=Xat]Xat Chat[/url][/center]
[center][b]Staff[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://i277.photobucket.com/albums/kk51/jssmiles/10qhzb8.png[/img] Main Owner/Developer=bad picswizard [img]http://i277.photobucket.com/albums/kk51/jssmiles/10qhzb8.png[/img] Main Owner=Mod Chase [img]http://i277.photobucket.com/albums/kk51/jssmiles/10qhzb8.png[/img] Main Owner/GFX Team=Mod Chandler [img]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad30/Artn96/avatar_1.gif[/img] Head Admin=Deminished[/center]
[center][b]Opened Staff Spots[/b][/center] [center]Developer=[/center]
[center][b]Features[/b][/center]
[center]100% Dicing[/center] [center]Pking Skill[/center] [center]Money Pouch[/center] [center]10x hit option[/center] [center]Working DFS Spec[/center] [center]Working Korasi Sword/Spec[/center] [center]100% Dclaw spec[/center] [center]Custom Donator Zone[/center] [center][/center]
Red = Not Done Orange = Almost Green = Done
[center][b]Planned Updates[/b][/center]
[center]Adding Nex[/center] [center]Completing Premium Zone[/center] [center]Moved Donator Zone[/center] [center]Move Donator Shops[/center] [center]Add Premium Rank[/center] [center]Add Staffzone[/center] [center]Add Staffzone Shops[/center] [center]Add ALL Custom Shops[/center] [center]Make PK Armor Degrade[/center] [center]Add Chill zone[/center] [center]Add Mithril Dragon to Brimhaven Dungeon[/center] [center]Fix Skill's Glitch[/center] [center]Remove Player Owned Shops[/center] [center]Custom Home[/center] [center]Custom Shopping Mall[/center] [center][/center]
Update 1: [youtube]http://youtu.be/pXRvArO9-GA[/youtube]

item.title: TheRS-Project
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Updates Have Happend! Please check them out

A friend and myself have postponed our project at the moment, if yo need developers we will apply.

Read full topic

item.title: TheRS-Project
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“KingClay, post:8, topic:480123”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=598359.msg4209590#msg4209590 date=1359346279]

yes i do because people don’t want to code for me xD

Do it yourself. Use tutorials to start and learn along the way. It makes it a lot more fun, I promise.
[/quote]

Thanks for the Idea and if i set up something i could save the files for next time!

Not the most appealing advertisement thread… like the others…

Im working on it…[/quote]

No problem, if you need any help just pm me. I’d do some off set developing to help get you started.

Read full topic

item.title: TheRS-Project
item.dc:creator: @KingClay KingClay
item.description:
@KingClay wrote:

[quote=“nolan2131, post:7, topic:480123”][quote author=KingClay link=topic=598359.msg4209361#msg4209361 date=1359327621]
yes i do because people don’t want to code for me xD
[/quote]

Do it yourself. Use tutorials to start and learn along the way. It makes it a lot more fun, I promise.[/quote]

Thanks for the Idea and if i set up something i could save the files for next time!

Soulcist:

Not the most appealing advertisement thread… like the others…

Im working on it…

Read full topic

yes i do because people don’t want to code for me xD

Do it yourself. Use tutorials to start and learn along the way. It makes it a lot more fun, I promise.
